alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 11:59AM PST until January 15 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...From noon Saturday to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lighter snow is expected to continue through Monday, with only a few inches of additional accumulation.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
